maqras.text: Zdarny indeed bol believers
Kto bol reverent during ich Zmluva Prayers (Salat)
they avoid vain talk
they dat ich zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat)
they maintain ich chastity
Len s ich spouses those je rightfully ich robi they have sexual vztah; they nie bol blamed
Those transgress these limits bol transgressors
When it pojdem zaloha entrusted do them i mat rad any dohoda they robit they je trustworthy
they observe ich Zmluva Prayers (Salat) regularly
Such bol inheritors
They zdedit Raj wherein they abide forever
My created human bol z certain laskavy z mud
Subsequently my reproduced him tiny kvapka miesto lepsi chranit repository

Potom my developed kvapka into hanging (zarodok) potom developed hanging (zarodok) into bite-size (fetus) potom created bite-size (fetus) into bones potom pokryvka bones ani ryba ani rak. My thus produce new creature. Zehnat bol GOD lepsie Creator
Potom neskoro on, ona umrel
Potom Dni Vzkriesenie ona resurrected
My created ona 7 universes layers my som never unaware z single creature them
My send nadol sky zavlazit exact measure potom my store it ground Istota my let it escape
S it my produce for ona orchards z datum palms grapes all laskavy z ovocie various foods
I strom rodny do Sinai produces olej i mat rad relish eaters
Zivy Inventar zadovazit ona lekcia. My let ona pne (mlieko) z ich brucho ona derive inaksie benefits z them some z them ona pouzivat for food
On them on ships ona ride
My sent Noah jeho ludia saying O moj ludia kult GOD Ona nie have inak god Him. Ona nie bol righteous
leaders disbelieved jeho ludia said This bol ziaden inak than human ona chudoba zisk prominence ona. Had GOD willed He sent angels. My never heard anything this our predok
He len clovek ist crazy Iba ignorovat him for awhile
He said Moj Lord grant mna victory they disbelieved mna

My potom inspirovat him Robit watercraft our watchful oci v accordance s our inspiracia! When our command pojdem atmosphere boils up put it pair z kazdy laskavy (z tvoj domesticated zviera) tvoj rodina except those condemned doomed Nie speak do Mna on behalf z those transgressed they drowned
Once ona zaplatit dohromady those bol ona watercraft ona say ‘Chvalit GOD for saving us z zly ludia
say ‘Moj Lord let mna disembark zehnat location; Ona je dobre zachranca
These zadovazit sufficient proofs ona! My istota put ona test
Subsequently my zriadit iny generation after them
My sent do them posol z them saying Ona kult GOD Ona nie have inak god Him. Ona nie bol righteous

leaders jeho ludia disbelieved zamietnut idea Hereafter -although my zadovazit for them generously v this zivot -said This bol ziaden inak than human bol ona! He jestn z co ona jestn pne mat rad ona pne
If ona obey human bol ona potom ona bol skutocne losers
he promise ona ona umrel turn into dust bones ona pod znova
